siteMetadata.description: IT Engineer, Android developer, based in Italy.
siteMetadata.about: Hello there! I'm a passionate Android Developer based in Cesena, a small town in North-Eastern Italy. I received a Master’s Degree from Università di Bologna in 2018 and have been developing Android apps (and learning!) for a living since then.
